verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth תָּגֵ֣ל <S%H1523><s%> rejoice הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> let the earth יִ֝שְׂמְח֗וּ <S%H8055><s%> be glad אִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> of isles רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> let the multitude

עָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> Clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֣ל <S%H6205><s%> and darkness סְבִיבָ֑יו <S%H5439><s%> [are] round about צֶ֥דֶק <S%H6664><s%> him righteousness וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <S%H4349><s%> [are] the habitation כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3678><s%> of his throne
אֵ֭שׁ <S%H784><s%> A fire לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before תֵּלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> goes וּתְלַהֵ֖ט <S%H3857><s%> him and burneth up סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> round about צָרָֽיו׃ <S%H6862><s%> his enemies

הֵאִ֣ירוּ <S%H215><s%> enlightened בְרָקָ֣יו <S%H1300><s%> His lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> the world רָאֲתָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> saw וַתָּחֵ֣ל <S%H2342><s%> and trembled הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

הָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> The hills כַּדּוֹנַ֗ג <S%H1749><s%> like wax נָ֭מַסּוּ <S%H4549><s%> melted מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence אֲד֣וֹן <S%H113><s%> of the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth

הִגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> declare הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> The heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <S%H6664><s%> his righteousness וְרָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> see כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> and all the people כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> his glory

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ ׀ <S%H954><s%> Confounded כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹ֬בְדֵי <S%H5647><s%> be all they that serve פֶ֗סֶל <S%H6459><s%> graven images הַמִּֽתְהַלְלִ֥ים <S%H1984><s%> that boast בָּאֱלִילִ֑ים <S%H457><s%> themselves of idols הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> worship ל֝וֹ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> him all [ye] gods

שָׁמְעָ֬ה <S%H8085><s%> heard וַתִּשְׂמַ֨ח ׀ <S%H8055><s%> and was glad צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וַ֭תָּגֵלְנָה <S%H1523><s%> rejoiced בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> Because מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <S%H4941><s%> because of thy judgments יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> For thou LORD עֶלְי֥וֹן <S%H5945><s%> [art] high above עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the earth מְאֹ֥ד <S%H3966><s%> far above נַ֝עֲלֵ֗יתָ <S%H5927><s%> thou art exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> all gods

אֹהֲבֵ֥י <S%H157><s%> Ye that love יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שִׂנְא֫וּ <S%H8130><s%> hate רָ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> evil שֹׁ֭מֵר <S%H8104><s%> he preserveth נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <S%H5315><s%> the souls חֲסִידָ֑יו <S%H2623><s%> of his saints מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <S%H5337><s%> he delivereth

א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> Light זָרֻ֣עַ <S%H2232><s%> is sown לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> for the righteous וּֽלְיִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> for the upright לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> in heart שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> and gladness

שִׂמְח֣וּ <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <S%H3034><s%> and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of his holiness
